title: Riot fix this
body: During a bots game my connect went bad for at least 3 times and as a result I quit the game. Then the game ended and I resulted in 5 Low Priority Queues. So do I get this penalty for having bad internet? Thanks Riot

replies.body: I have been having spiking issues, not leaving game. the ping is in the 100s but feels like 200-250
But leaving and reconnecting usually helps me computer in these cases. But ok I'll try not to leave the game and suffer the miserable "attempting to reconnect" sign.

nono, I'm telling you about me
my game never leaves

Regardless of whether your internet went out or you intentionally left the game, your teammates were still at a disadvantage while you were gone which is why you ended up with an LPQ. In this case, it's meant to be a warning to help you troubleshoot your connection troubles before it gets worse. Check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that you might need to update and let me know how it helps.
